definition: enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc/cage/basket/steamer basket/to cover/to cage/to embrace/to manipulate through trickery
net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body

sentences.english: I'm no more fond of selling such a candidate than you are.
sentences.chinese: 我和你一樣，並不想爲這位候選人去籠絡人心。

sentences.english: And the group of research and development of kylin game however draw over the elite inside the industry.
sentences.chinese: 而麒麟遊戲的研發團隊卻籠絡了行業內的精英。

sentences.english: How are they going to get their next million users?
sentences.chinese: 他們要去籠絡新的一百萬用戶嗎？

definition: to gang up for personal interest (idiom)/to form a clique
to obscure the facts (idiom); to mislead the public with prevarication and deliberate falsehoods
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
Hundred Days Reform (1898), failed attempt to reform the Qing dynasty
the trick of injuring oneself to gain the enemy's confidence/CL:條|条[tiao2]
to see, hear and obey (idiom); to take advice/to take sb at his word
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4
